description: While two drillers were connecting compressed air hose-pipe to jack hammer drill machine at a distance of 3.5m from the development face in an underground Metalliferous Mine, a mass of stone measuring about 1.0m x 0.5m x 0.35m fell from the unsupported roof from a height of about 4.0m on one of the drillers inflicting serious bodily injuries to him to which he succumbed after about seven hours.
recommendation: Had the workings within 9.0m of the face been kept secured by rock bolts... this accident could have been averted.

description: While a crew of four General Mazdoors standing on a scissor lift was charging ring holes in hanging wall drive of a stope, a mass of rock separated from the roof of the drive... broke into two pieces and fell down over the platform of scissor lift from a height of about 1.5m, inflicting serious bodily injury to one of them to which he succumbed on way to hospital.
recommendation: Had the roof been properly examined to ascertain the condition thereof... this accident could have been averted.

description: While blasted muck was being removed manually in a stope of underground manganese mine, a rock mass parted from the hanging wall side and fell over a face worker, inflicting serious bodily injuries to him to which he succumbed.
recommendation: Had the hangwall side of the stope been made and kept secured... this accident could have been averted.

description: While two workers were working at the top of a 6m high side... a block of marble measuring about 7m x 2m x 1.25m fell from a height of about 4.5m and buried the workers, inflicting fatal injury to both.
recommendation: Had it been ensured that sides are adequately benched, sloped and secured... this accident could have been averted.

description: Loose boulders embedded and hanging on the high-wall fell from a height of 22.5m on a contractual worker, inflicting serious bodily injuries, to which he succumbed.
recommendation: Had the sides of opencast workings been benched and kept sloped and secured... this accident could have been averted.

description: Side of the bench slid, partially burying one worker and a boulder fell and hit him inflicting serious bodily injuries which turned fatal after nine days.
recommendation: Had the sides of the bench been dressed properly and effective supervision provided... this accident could have been averted.

description: Sides of the bench slid and an excavator fell to a lower bench; operator was buried and died on way to hospital.
recommendation: Had the sides of the bench been secured... this accident could have been averted.

description: While the man winding cage was signaled for lowering, the roof of the cage got stuck and then travelled at high speed; the bellman received serious injuries and succumbed.
recommendation: Had proper interlocks and procedures been ensured... this accident could have been averted.

incidentType: Other Accident due to Winding Operation
description: While cleaning at headgear frame, a skip was unloaded into a waste rock storage bin carrying a mazdoor along with ore resulting in fatal injuries.
recommendation: Had power to winding engine been disconnected and safe procedures followed... this accident could have been averted.

description: While taking measurement of discharge end take up pulley of a conveyor belt by standing on it, the belt was operated trapping him between conveyor belt and take up pulley receiving serious injuries.
recommendation: Had Standard Maintenance Practice for shutdown been followed... this accident could have been averted.
